ygData.subject: Re: New bard plate
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh!  I was telling a ranger friend of mine that once I got my armor, I was to be known from then on as Robo-Smurf -=B=- ... From: jhenders@bogon.com
ygData.messageBody:
Heh! I was telling a ranger friend of mine that once I got my armor, I was to be known from then on as Robo-Smurf

-=B=-
-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... <jhenders@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 6:41 PM
Subject: [eqbards] New bard plate


>From: jhenders@...
>
>It just occured to me that the new colour for our plate is particularly
>appropriate. Now when we enter dungeons, we can announce "Attention
>Monsters, your blue plate special for today will be...."
>
